name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in building high-performance applications. Proficient in **Elixir**, **Phoenix**, and **Postgres**, with a solid track record in leveraging **AWS** services and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines using **GitLab**. Adept in deploying containerized applications with **Docker** and managing orchestrated environments using **Kubernetes**. Experienced in frontend development frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, enhancing user-driven application features.
Possesses strong expertise in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, ensuring solutions meet standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Knowledgeable in MLOps practices, including model training and orchestration using MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.
